Published February 24 2015

Some Changes to the RSS Feeds

Some Changes to the RSS Feeds — Small RSS update: Tapping on the title of a Signals link in the RSS feed will now take you to the linked-to content. No more tapping through to AF, only to have to tap again on the outbound link. I liked readers actually reading on the site, but the implementation was unintuitive and painful — sorry about that. Should you want to go to the corresponding AF page, I’ve included a permalink at the bottom of every Signals post.

Thanks to Chris Gonzales for his email that pushed me to make this change. If anyone else sees something weird in the RSS feed, do let me know.

Enjoy your day.
